items.title: General Mills to close pizza, pet food manufacturing plants in Missouri
items.description: The Minnesota-based food giant announced closures of pizza crust and pet food factories in Missouri, expecting $82 million in restructuring charges.

items.title: ETFs are flush with new money. Why billions more are flowing their way
items.description: Investors are plowing more money into exchange-traded funds putting the industry on pace to rake in trillions.
